website_summaries.verdict: The Ontario Mid is a successful addition to Merrell’s wide selection of outdoor products. Its trail performance is appreciated, thanks to its comfy confines, roomy toe box, and true-to-width fit. It was a bit lacking in arch support though.Overall, the positives of the Merrell Ontario Mid outweigh its shortcomings; using an aftermarket insole can resolve its weak point though.
pros: The majority of the Merrell Ontario Mid reviews admire the plush feel of the Merrell Ontario Mid
The spacious toe room of this comfy boot for hiking has received praise from several owners
Many wearers love this lightweight trail boot from Merrell
Its virtually zero break-in period has delighted a considerable number of users
A handful like the Merrell men's and women's Ontario Mid because of its classic styling
A high percentage of online buyers say that this boot is true to width
cons: A couple of wearers say that the Ontario Mid from Merrell is lacking arch support

customer_reviews.title: So far, great boot!
customer_reviews.text: This is the most comfortable hiker I've had yet. I have not tested out the water proofing, but I'm sure it works. The sole is very soft on these and they fit just perfect. I did swap out the insoles, but I do that to everything I buy since I found some that I'm in love with. So far they have been durable but I'm assuming with the soft rubber sole they will wear fast, but for comfort I am fine with that.
customer_reviews.author: Cody Guess

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: As it's summer in the south and hot-I haven't taken these hiking just yet. I've mostly worn them around the house and gotta say that my initial impression is a good one. They are a hiking tennis shoe so to speak? They are very light and pretty much true to fit. The toe box is a bit tight but with time I'm sure that will get better. I've had heel issues that led to blisters in the past mostly due to a seam in the heel-these boots don't have that -nice! Give these a try if you're looking for something light and pretty darn comfortable!
customer_reviews.author: David E.

customer_reviews.title: Nice shoe, just not right for me.
customer_reviews.text: I've got messed up feet and am very picky about boots. These are comfortable, good looking boots with good support and a nice cushion sole. I had to return them because of the cushioning. Again, this isn't a knock on the boot, it's my own needs in a boot.
customer_reviews.author: R. Roberts

customer_reviews.title: I was tricked.
customer_reviews.text: Well, had bought these boots several months ago. Put them in storage until Summer hit. Upon opening the box, noticed the boots appeared much greener than the picture for Dark Earth. Did some appraisal and found the company had put the cheaper non waterproof Olive Green in the box for the more expensive Dark Earth. Quite sneaky and some people might not even notice the difference. Not happy and will contact the vendor for an explanation.
customer_reviews.author: Alcan

customer_reviews.title: Great boots so far.
customer_reviews.text: I’m a fan of Merrell boots. I have had these for almost 3 weeks and they are holding up great so far considering I typically get just a few months per pair of boots. Great buy
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Don’t pass these up.
customer_reviews.text: Super comfortable and very light. The combo of the hiking boot/shoe makes for a very nice fit. Hope to get in a lot of hiking miles in these things.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron

customer_reviews.title: Held up great
customer_reviews.text: 11.5 was true to size... bought these for my Havasupai Falls/Sedona Trip this year.... hiked about 45 miles in these bad boys. Not one blister. Highly recommend them and other quality Merrels.
customer_reviews.author: JD

customer_reviews.title: Great boot, good value.
customer_reviews.text: It has been a while since I bought from Merrell, but this boot was a great value and while I have not used it much (not hiking season yet) they are comfortable and about true to size.
customer_reviews.author: Michael P. Yost

customer_reviews.title: A very comfortable fit. Will buy again.
customer_reviews.text: The boot is lightweight and is fabulous to work & walk in.
customer_reviews.author: Touche'

customer_reviews.title: Deep enough for AFO
customer_reviews.text: Toe box is deep enough to accommodate the ankle foot orthotics. Great looking shoes
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable for my husband, who has diabetic neuropathy causing pain in his feet. Not all footwear is comfortable for him. We will buy more for this reason.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Extremely light
customer_reviews.text: Extremely light. Mild tread/traction. Good for casual walking around town and standing.
customer_reviews.author: Belle

customer_reviews.title: Runs large
customer_reviews.text: Did not fit at all. Big in the toes as well as the heel. Really wanted these to work. Love the color, lack of stitching, sturdy sole and great height.
customer_reviews.author: Neil Beck

customer_reviews.title: well made hiking boot
customer_reviews.text: Product fit as expected/ordered. Broke in the other day, and were comfortable
customer_reviews.author: Gregory E. Marcelo

customer_reviews.title: A very poorly made knockoff
customer_reviews.text: This shoe is just a knockoff version of the Danner Mountain 600... boo on Merrell for taking a design from another company. Or should I say boo on Wolverine... they even tried to mimic the vibram logo on the side of the midsole. I wish I had another hand, so I could give these shoes 3 thumbs down
customer_reviews.author: Brandon D.

product_meta.title: Merrell Mens Ontario Mid
product_meta.description: Clean and nostalgic, this hiker features rich full grain leathers and a sticky Vibram Megagrip for confidence on any adventure. FEATURES Full grain leather upper Metal hooks and D-rings for secure lacing Bellows tongue keeps debris out M Select FRESH antimicrobial agents reduces shoe odor Breathable mesh lining Merrell Air Cushion in the heel absorbs shock and adds stability Merrell Kinetic Fit BASE removable contoured insole for flexible support Compression molded EVA midsole for stability and comfort Vibram Megagrip 3 mm lug depth Includes pair of accent laces Weight: 1 lb 15oz / 888g
feature_bullets: Merrell Kinetic Fit BASE removable contoured footbed for flexible support
